EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to Applicant when Grantee submits Progress Report for approval
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Applicant Progress Report Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Progress Report {!ProgressReports__c.Name} has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Progress Report {!01If40000004fzY.Name} for Grant # {!ProgressReports__c.GrantName__c} has been submitted
Dear {!ProgressReports__c.ProgramApprover__c},
This email is to notify you that the Progress Report {!01If40000004fzY.Name} has been submitted for approval and is ready for your review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
